CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The device containing the 1 : 4 w / w blend as the photoactive layer after thermal annealing at 150 째C delivers at superior performance with the J SC of 11.7 mA / cm^2 , V OC of 0.79 V , and FF of 45% , improving the PCE to 4.12% , an approximately 37% enhance - ment in PCE , when compared to the reference cell based on PCDTBT : PC71BM for the sake of comparison ( see SI ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 1 : 4 w / w blend |
| PCDTBT : PC71BM |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "1 : 4 w / w blend" and "PCDTBT : PC71BM". These materials are referred to as photoactive layers in the device being discussed.
